Key points 



Key points


    

  • England is part of the UK
    • 

  • The UK is in Europe
    • 

  • Europe is one of six continents
    • 

  • Continents make up the land mass of the earth
    •

Key points

  • England is part of the UK
  • The UK is in Europe
  • Europe is one of six continents
  • Continents make up the land mass of the earth

Steps 



What you need to do


    

  1. Fill in the appropriate form
    2. 

  2. Take it to the post office
    3. 

  3. Send it
    4. 

  4. Wait for a response
    5. 

  5. Once approved, come and see us.
    6.

What you need to do

  1. Fill in the appropriate form
  2. Take it to the post office
  3. Send it
  4. Wait for a response
  5. Once approved, come and see us.

Side piece 



Facts about moles


    
  
  • A moles can dig up to 18 feet in one hour
    • 
  
  • Moles don’t hibernate
    • 
  
  • These little animals paralyze worms and insects with poison in their saliva. Then they store the insects in an underground room to eat later.
    •

Facts about moles

  • A moles can dig up to 18 feet in one hour
  • Moles don’t hibernate
  • These little animals paralyze worms and insects with poison in their saliva. Then they store the insects in an underground room to eat later.

Articles 






Title 1


Description 1







Title 2


Description 2







Title 3


Description 3

A list of things in box format + zebra stripes.

Academic Search Complete

Database: A multi-disciplinary full-text database, with nearly 6,000 full-text periodicals, including more than 5,000 peer-reviewed journals. In addition to full text, this database offers abstracts for over 10,000 journals books, reports and conference proceedings.

IEEE Xplore

Database: The full text of all papers, many going back to the 1860s, including the journals, transactions, magazines and conference proceedings of the Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers (IEEE) and the Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET) - formerly the Institution of Electrical Engineers (IEE) - plus approximately 900 standards and the standards dictionary. We recommend using the Advanced Search for full-text searching

Science Direct

Database: The full texts of over 1000 scientific, technical, medical, mathematical, management and social science journals. 1995 onwards. Provides e-mail 'alerts' to update searches and announce the arrival of latest journal issues. 'Cited by' facility lists papers that have cited any article displayed on the screen. Includes access to selected full-text encyclopedias. (You will be asked to register on your first visit only).

Title 3


Description 3

An introduction to Library Services for postgraduate students

Find out more about how the OU Library supports postgraduate students during their studies. It's also a nice elephant.

Going mobile with Library Services

Bob discovers how using his mobile to access the online library can help him study on the go. Good old Bob!

Being digital: developing essential skills for study, work and life online

Bob discovers "Being digital", a collection of short interactive activities which help him develop essential skills for study, work and life online.
